tool_description: Nicereply is a web-based analytic tool used to determine customer satisfaction with your agents, products or services.
name: Nicereply
title: Nicereply

api_list.name: getCompanyStats
api_list.description: retrieve all public attributes for given Company identified by API key
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nicereply-nicereply.p.rapidapi.com/getCompanyStats"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nicereply-nicereply.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getUserRatingsCount
api_list.description: retrieve total number of all ratings of given agent for given Company identified by API key.

optional_parameters.name: username
optional_parameters.description: agent's username, last piece of his link text [use if userid not provided]

optional_parameters.name: userid
optional_parameters.description: (unsigned int) agent's ID [use if username not provided]

api_list.name: getPublicCompanyRatings
api_list.description: retrieve public profile ratings for given Company identified by API key.

required_parameters.name: pagesize
required_parameters.description: (unsigned int) number of items per page

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: (unsigned int) page number of ratings list

api_list.name: getUserDifference
api_list.description: retrieve percentage difference of average score of ratings arrived this and previous week for concrete agent within Company identified by API key.

required_parameters.name: userid
required_parameters.description: (unsigned int) agent's ID [use if username not provided]

optional_parameters.name: username
optional_parameters.description: agent's username, last piece of his link text [use if userid not provided]

api_list.name: getCompanyRatings
api_list.description: retrieve pagged list of complete ratings of all agents for given Company identified by API key. In reverse time order.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: (unsigned int) page number of ratings list

optional_parameters.name: pagesize
optional_parameters.description: (unsigned int) number of items per page
